PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-01292016-03-11,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActJudges Act (Removal Allowance) Order
SubjectHon. Clément Gascon ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
PrecisOrder authorizing additional reimbursement period for the Hon. CLÉMENT GASCON, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, for the reimbursement of the difference between the sale price of the former residence and its fair market value from March 1, 2016 to August 31, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Hon. Clément Gascon ** REMOVAL ALLOWANCE **
precis: Order authorizing additional reimbursement period for the Hon. CLÉMENT GASCON, a Puisne Judge of the Supreme Court of Canada, for the reimbursement of the difference between the sale price of the former residence and its fair market value from March 1, 2016 to August 31, 2016.
